subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: For the second straight day, the Islanders erased a 3-1 deficit and went on to beat the Rangers on a late third-period power-play goal by Thomas Vanek and an empty-net goal by Frans Nielsen.
snippet: For the second straight day, the Islanders erased a 3-1 deficit and went on to beat the Rangers on a late third-period power-play goal by Thomas Vanek and an empty-net goal by Frans Nielsen.
